column4: I'm trying to build a kernel module against the Ubuntu 8.04 kernel source. I got this error: linux-2.6.24-ubuntu804/scripts/Makefile.modpost:42: include/config/auto.conf.  Any idea?

I'm trying to build a kernel module against the Ubuntu 8.04 kernel source. I got this error: linux-2.6.24-ubuntu804/scripts/Makefile.modpost:42: include/config/auto.conf: No such file or directory.  Any idea?
